summary: Unlucky in love and bullied at work, an office drone is resigned to his dead-end life until it's transformed by mysterious calls from - himself.
cast: Farhan Akhtar|Deepika Padukone|Ram Kapoor|Shefali Shah|Vivan Bhatena|Vipin Sharma|Yatin Karyekar|Taraana Raja|Vinay Jain|Siddhartha Gupta|Swapnel Desai|Kanchan Pagare|Brijendra Kala|Haansaa|Khyati Kanchan|Vijay Badlani|Abhay Joshi|Zafar|Prachi|Deepak Ramachandra|Vinod Goswami|Salim Patni|Akashdeep|Akshat Trivedi|Vidyadhar Karmakar|Tikaram Dhakal|Taha|Irshad|Jagdish Kansara|Arshad Sheikhlal Pathan|Uma Rane|Athar Nawaaz|Chinmay|A.R. Manikandan|Kavita|Anand Kumar Ekbote|Hansa Singh
title: Karthik Calling Karthik
